original_text: The king of Babylon slaughtered the sons of Zedekiah before his eyes, and also slaughtered all the officials of Judah at Riblah.
korean_text: 바벨론 왕이 시드기야의 아들들을 그의 눈 앞에서 죽이고 또 리블라에서 유다의 모든 고관을 죽이며

sentences.original_text: The king of Babylon slaughtered the sons of Zedekiah
and also slaughtered all the officials of Judah
